prod_short_desc: Stop the Stone stomper with the King’s Guard battle vehicle!
prod_long_desc:
Protect the kingdom of Knighton with the King’s Guard Artillery battle vehicle, featuring a LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ minifigure cockpit, six-stud shooter and rear-wheel-activated extending swords at the front. Includes two minifigures.
Includes two minifigures: a King’s Guard and a Stone stomper.
Features a six-stud shooter, two rear-wheel-activated extending and detachable swords and a minifigure cockpit.
Launch a hail of studs at the Stone stomper with the six-stud shooter!
Push the rear wheel to extend the two front swords for defense mode.
Weapons include the King's Guard's spear and Stone stomper's lightning hammer.
Watch all your favorite NEXO KNIGHTS™ characters on Cartoon Network.
The King's Guard Artillery vehicle measures over 2” high, 5” long and 3” wide.
